feature.name: Shifting
feature.shortDescription: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action. While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution bonus (minimum of 1). While shifting, you can use the Dash action as a bonus action. You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.
